name: {{spawn}}
description:
{{spawn}} is a net.art visual poetry generator that uses user text input to dynamically create patterns with characters.  The system is simple, but there's a lot of variation you can get from it. Letters and words carry meaning, while symbols create structures and fractals.  You can create some pretty intricate designs.

Feel free to use anything you've created in your own projects, either verbatim or adapted, crediting Xavier Velastin wherever possible.
